document.full_text: the horse is on the truck. that's kentucky derby winner animal kingdom riding along in keith cooper's tractor trailer headed north and east from from kentucky to maryland today. at last report he was zooming past keeneland at about 6:40 tuesday morning.
document.title: the rail: animal kingdom is heading home
